title: Special to Express: ‘Two years after Chinese aggression in Eastern Ladakh, time to change the narrative’ - The Indian Express
content:
1. Special to Express: ‘Two years after Chinese aggression in Eastern Ladakh, time to change the narrative’  The Indian Express
  2. Two years after Galwan, de-escalation still to take place on Ladakh LAC  Hindustan Times
  3. There's a Chinese 'storm' coming. India needs to consider 5 factors to face this challenge  ThePrint
  4. View Full coverage on Google News
description: There is a pressing requirement to have a single professional Rashtriya Border Guard by amalgamating central armed police forces, with the entire gamut of border management coming under the Army, and building partnerships is a strategic imperative to effectively checkmate future Chinese misadventures.
